Articles.Content:
Ok, I'm sure many of you have at least watched the anime known as Neon Genesis Evangelion. I was wondering, who do you think would make a more suitable girlfriend for Shinji? 

For me, I say that Rei is more suitable.

Probably Maya Ibuki. =/

(Also, for obvious reasons, this sort of thread can wander into very creepy territory.)

Edit: Misread. Let's go with Kaworu.

Yup, most people are too narrow-minded not to think that one might have two (or more) girlfriends at the same time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Can a moderator edit my poll to include a both option?

Yes. and some characters
Yeah I will go for both. Can't decide actually.

Asuka is too emotionally damaged to be in a stable relationship.

It just will not work. I dated a girl like Asuka in high school and it ended poorly.

It was the funnest three months of my life, but there is no way to make it work.

I'd do it again, but it won't work. Did I mention it was the best three months of my life?

I voted for Rei and then remembered what she was..........oh crap is it too late to add Misato.

You think that scene with Darth Vader was awkward.......

And remember that Shinji is not especially strong emotionally. Both don't fit him and his need to be understood.

+ I can't choose Rei alone due to her being the clone of his mother (don't mind the hair and eyes) and I know he don't remember her (mother) but still... Well she is my favorite character but for a kid like him... she is too weird.

"too emotionally damaged...."

summary of entire series and most of its characters ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Did anyone else get a giggle when both Rei and Shinji said they smell the other when they were in each other's Eva for the compatability tests?

From a psychological standpoint, Asuka would be the obvious choice since Shinji is a definite introvert and Asuka has a lot more outgoing personality. As such, they balance each other out. Rei is introverted too, and as such her being in a relationship with Shinji just wouldn't work.

> 
> From a psychological standpoint, Asuka would be the obvious choice since Shinji is a definite introvert and Asuka has a lot more outgoing personality. As such, they balance each other out. Rei is introverted too, and as such her being in a relationship with Shinji just wouldn't work.

I'd be more concerned with their kids having six fingers and toes.

> 
> I'd be more concerned with their kids having six fingers and toes.

Don't worry to much, IIRC Rei can't have child.

Come to think of it, Rei and him have pretty good relationship throughout the anime (didn't see the rebuilt version yet)... yeah she never act normally but they do care for each other.
Yeah, I alway have a chuckle whenever Asuka is being a jerk to Shinji, Rei calmly stands up to her.

Can I pick "neither"? Sure, the kids are cute. But Rei has this creepy, passive toy vibe. Asuka's so obnoxious she reminds me of myself as a teen. Misato, on the other hand, is a hard-drinking party girl who handles enormous responsibilities with class...and a penguin. Very much the "short skirt and long jacket" type, which I adore. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
